markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Primal Wellspring](/Feats.aspx?ID=352) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 139 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Primal Focus](/Feats.aspx?ID=342)

</column>

---

Your reservoir of Focus Points is a deep wellspring. If you have spent at least 3 Focus Points since the last time you Refocused, you recover 3 Focus Points when you Refocus instead of 1.
name: Primal Wellspring
